I learned much the same lesson myself.  Had cracked FS9 FSD products and then legally bought one.  The detected cracks had my windows so jacked up that I literally had to resort to a clean windows reinstall to start over.  I finally just trashed the cracked copies and decided FSD was one I'll never use a cracked copy from again.

Thank the Goddess for partitioning . . . at least that made the windows reinstall easier.
